problems: Customers reported longer wait times than expected.
The quality of food did not meet customer expectations.
improve: Implement a more efficient order management system.
Conduct regular quality checks on food preparation.

problems: Staff appeared untrained and unresponsive to requests.
Ambiance was deemed too loud for a comfortable dining experience.
improve: Offer staff training sessions focused on customer service skills.
Consider soundproofing options or music volume controls.

problems: Inconsistent food quality was noted across different visits.
Billing errors caused frustration among customers.
improve: Standardize recipes to ensure consistent food quality.
Enhance the billing process to eliminate errors and delays.
